statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = '9fb29d08-0f3b-4bb4-b6f1-a85b2e3bb429';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions WHERE email_campaign_id = 'b09a09b4-1fac-4c59-9281-251574fda2c7';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT email_campaign_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE end_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, subscription_status FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = FALSE ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers JOIN email_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = campaign_id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE end_date > NOW() ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, total_interactions FROM campaigns ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN customer_interactions ON customers.customer_id = customer_interactions.customer_id;

SELECT campaign_name, opens_count, clicks_count, conversions_count FROM email_campaigns JOIN engagement_metrics ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = engagement_metrics.campaign_id WHERE opens_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, opens_count, clicks_count, conversions_count FROM email_campaigns e JOIN engagement_metrics em ON e.campaign_id = em.campaign_id WHERE opens_count > 100 AND clicks_count > 50;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT conversion_date, conversion_value FROM conversions WHERE conversion_value > 100 ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT interactions.interaction_id, customers.customer_name, interactions.interaction_type FROM interactions INNER JOIN customers ON interactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id;

SELECT conversions.conversion_id, clicks.clicked_link, conversions.conversion_value FROM conversions INNER JOIN clicks ON conversions.interaction_id = clicks.interaction_id ORDER BY conversions.conversion_date ASC;
